title: Requiem
description: Husbands. Mothers. Teachers. Ordinary People. Super strength. Super speed. Invulnerability. Extraordinary gifts. Return to Jefferson Falls in this new collection of thought-provoking, genre-bending superhuman fiction. The twelve tales presented here originally appeared in such award-winning online magazines as "Strange Horizons", "Cyber Age Adventures", and "Aphelion". Collected in print for the first time, these Super!!Stories!! continue to put the human in superhuman.
author: Frank Byrns
